div.p:
Aappropriate to the
day, I made a
great mistake
in sending manu
script headings
to I think XIV
XV & XVI Chaps
and here I find
that I have them
in type - don't
know how I
overlooked them.
I send them stuck
to 83 page though
I fear they are April
fools.

I send also 83-101
final revise and
paged matter 81-144
corrected & trusting
the printer will not
overlook the errata
noted.

I send also the
proof of the Falls
and think that
the artist has
done very well indeed
with them - If he
could make the
part I have marked
thus look
perpendicular
rock. It would be
better as the chasm
is so prolonged
but I don't know
what can be done
on the block -

Referring to the
woodcut on page 95
I wish our artist
friend had been
married to the
pig faced lady and
the divorce court
abolished, but I
suppose he could
not alter it after
the face was on the block.

I sent Denman &
Clapperton this morn-
ing with many
thanks and am &c
